snippet: The United States will soon name Derek J. Mitchell as the new ambassador to Myanmar, according to two news reports. Mr. Mitchell is currently the administration's special envoy to the country, which it still calls Burma. Washington has not had a...
abstract: The United States will soon name Derek J. Mitchell as the new ambassador to Myanmar, according to two news reports. Mr. Mitchell is currently the administration's special envoy to the country, which it still calls Burma. Washington has not had a full-fledged ambassador there since 1990.

headline.main: U.S. Said to Have Picked an Ambassador to Myanmar
